title: Auto industry needs to focus on customer service, after-sales, quality assurance: Nitin Gadkari
description: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari emphasized the need for the Indian automobile industry to focus on customer service, after-sales, and quality assurance. Speaking at the Auto Retail Conclave by FADA, he highlighted the sector's crucial role in driving economic growth and supporting the government's vision of a self-reliant India.
